title: (x) NFL.shop.com slab serif - custom font by Chester for Landor {BJ Harvey}
content:
Not quite sure if this a custom job or not.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091125152124im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hdr07_bgimage_3934.jpg)
author: Capnhud

comments.content: Reminds me of [Dispatch](http://web.archive.org/web/20091125152124/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/dispatch_condensed_black/?sample_text=NFLSHOP.COM&sample_size=48), but that isnâ€™t it.

[Dispatch Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20091125152124/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/dispatch/bold/) is what I thought but the serifs on the C did not match

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
I know I am in my own little world, but its ok. They know me here

The O seems to be rounder than aachen

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
I know I am in my own little world, but its ok. They know me here

Custom (is what I figured eventually).

See [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20091125152124/http:/dev.typophile.com/node/36848).

Always good to do a search first.

drilling down, how about, custom font by Chester for Landor for NFL?

see page 26 of this PDF ...

[http://www.bespoketype.com/BespokeTypeByChester\_070301.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20091125152124/http:/www.bespoketype.com/BespokeTypeByChester_070301.pdf "http://www.bespoketype.com/BespokeTypeByChester\_070301.pdf")

<cite>see page 26 of this PDF ...</cite> Brian you are the man.

@Jan I did try to find this before I posted, but nothing comes up for NFL font

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_
